FAQ.q: Can I buy my rented flow headset?

FeaturedProductShortDescription: Gentle Neuro is a smart, non-invasive tDCS headband designed to lift mood, ease anxiety, and restore focus by gently stimulating the brain’s natural pathways for calm and clarity. It’s an at-home mental health device backed by real neuroscience, not guesswork.
